qas.question: On what date was Spectre first shown in the UK?
Where was the first screening of Spectre?
What was the US release date for Spectre?
What were two subjects of accolades for Spectre?
For what category did Spectre receive a Golden Globe award?
What was the first James Bond film to be screened at IMAX theaters?
What was the theme song for the James Bond film Spectre?
What James Bond movie was released on 16 October 2015?
What James Bond movie was released on 26 October 2015 in the US?
Which 2015 James Bond film received overwhelmingly positive reviews?
Spectre won an Academy Award in which category?
What James Bond movie was released on 6 November 2015 in the UK?

context: <b7_0><b8_0><b9_0><b11_0>Spectre<b11_0/><b9_0/><b8_0/><b7_0/> was released on <a0_0>26 October 2015<a0_0/> in the United Kingdom on the same night as the world premiere at the <a1_0>Royal Albert Hall in London<a1_0/>, followed by a worldwide release. It was released in the United States on <a2_0>6 November 2015<a2_0/>. It became the second James Bond film to be screened in IMAX venues after <a5_0>Skyfall<a5_0/>, although it was not filmed with IMAX cameras. Spectre received mixed reviews upon its release; although criticised for its length, lack of screen time for new characters, and writing, it received praise for its <a3_0>action sequences and cinematography<a3_0/>. The theme song, "<a6_0>Writing's on the Wall<a6_0/>", received mixed reviews, particularly compared to the previous theme; nevertheless, it won the Golden Globe for <a4_0><b10_0>Best Original Song<b10_0/><a4_0/> and was nominated for the Academy Award in the same category. As of 20 February 2016[update], Spectre has grossed over $879 million worldwide.
